           <div class="info">
            <header class="info-header">
             <div class="meta">
              <!-- -->
             </div>
             <h3 class="title">
              <a href="/news/hundreds-gather-in-support-of-asian-americans-rallying-against-hate">
               Hundreds gather in support of Asian Americans at rally against hate
              </a>
             </h3>
            </header>
            <p>
             The crowd stood silently as the names of the victims were read aloud: Soon Chung Park, 74; Hyun Jung Grant, 51; Suncha Kim, 69; Yong Ae Yue, 63; Delaina Ashley Yaun, 33; Paul Andre Michels, 64; Xiaojie "Emily" Tan, 49; and Daoyou Feng, 44.
            </p>
            <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-21T21:55:09-05:00">
             8 hours ago
            </time>
            <!-- -->

          <article class="article post story-4" data-v-659d54c1="">
           <!-- -->
           <div class="m">
            <a href="/news/police-try-to-pull-over-maserati-and-passenger-and-driver-jump-out-and-run-off">

              <div class="col">
               <span>
                48
                <span class="deg">
                 °
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>

          </div>
         </header>

           <!-- -->
           <div class="m">
            <a href="/news/we-planned-his-funeral-husband-with-covid-19-beats-the-odds-and-wakes-up-after-7-week-coma">

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/trump-adviser-says-former-president-is-starting-his-own-social-media-platform-after-permanent-ban-from-others">
                Trump adviser says former president is starting his own social media platform after permanent ban from others
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              After being banned from social media for “inciting violence” ahead of the Jan. 6 riot, a senior adviser to former president Donald Trump says Trump has plans to make a comeback online by creating his own social media platform.
             </p>
             <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-21T15:52:58-05:00">
              14 hours ago
             </time>
             <!-- -->
            </div>

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/father-tom-hurley-of-chicagos-old-st-patricks-church-is-stepping-down">
                Father Tom Hurley of Chicago's Old St. Patrick's Church is stepping down
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              "I love Old St. Pat's and its mission with all my heart," Father Tom Hurley said in an emotional message on Sunday. "I have done my best to keep a joyful, strong, positive exterior, but it has come at the cost of my own health and well-being."
             </p>
             <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-21T21:58:11-05:00">
              8 hours ago
             </time>
             <!-- -->
            </div>
           </article>

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/astrazeneca-covid-19-vaccine-is-safe-79-effective-in-late-stage-us-study-company-says">
                AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine is safe, 79% effective in late-stage US study, company says
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              AstraZeneca’s COVID-19 vaccine provided strong protection against disease and complete protection against hospitalization and death across all age groups in a late-stage U.S. study.
             </p>
             <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-22T05:23:40-05:00">
              52 mins ago
             </time>
             <!-- -->
            </div>

            <div class="m">
             <a href="/news/astrazeneca-covid-19-vaccine-is-safe-79-effective-in-late-stage-us-study-company-says">
              <div class="responsive-image__container" data-v-0cd7fcba="">

                <img alt="AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine is safe, 79% effective in late-stage US study, company says" data-src="https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2021/03/592/333/GettyImages-1231869714.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1" data-srcset="https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2021/03/1184/666/GettyImages-1231869714.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1 2x" data-v-0cd7fcba="" src="https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2021/03/32/18/GettyImages-1231869714.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1" style="background:rgba(0,0,0,0);width:592px;margin:auto;height:0;padding-top:56.25%;"/>
               </div>
               <noscript data-v-0cd7fcba="">

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/astrazeneca-covid-19-vaccine-is-safe-79-effective-in-late-stage-us-study-company-says">
                AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine is safe, 79% effective in late-stage US study, company says
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              AstraZeneca’s COVID-19 vaccine provided strong protection against disease and complete protection against hospitalization and death across all age groups in a late-stage U.S. study.
             </p>

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/republican-congressman-apologizes-for-touching-woman-unhooking-her-bra">
                Republican congressman apologizes for touching woman, unhooking her bra
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              Nicolette Davis was 25 when Rep. Tom Reed unhooked her bra and touched her thigh at a bar in Minneapolis. "A drunk congressman is rubbing my back," she texted a co-worker. "HELP HELP." Reed now blames alcohol.
             </p>
             <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-21T20:05:20-05:00">
              10 hours ago
             </time>

             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/video/913200">
                Sunday is the last day to participate in Shamrock Shuffle
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              Shamrock Shuffle was a 3-day event this year, and Sunday is the last day to participate.
             </p>

            <div class="info">
             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/monopoly-getting-long-overdue-socially-conscious-makeover-hasbro-says">
                Monopoly getting 'long overdue' socially conscious makeover, Hasbro says
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              The board game “Monopoly” will be the next classic entertainment brand to receive a socially conscious makeover, publisher Hasbro announced this week.
             </p>
             <time class="time" datetime="2021-03-20T16:27:50-05:00">
              1 day ago
             </time>
             <!-- -->
            </div>
           </article>
           <article class="article post story-2" data-v-711e7e86="">
            <!-- -->
            <div class="m">
             <a href="/news/amc-opening-most-theaters-by-march-26">
              <div class="responsive-image__container" data-v-0cd7fcba="">
               <div class="responsive-image__lazy-container" data-v-0cd7fcba="" style="background-image:url('https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2021/03/592/333/snapshot-2021-03-18T184251.063.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1');">

            <div class="m">
             <a href="/news/will-there-be-a-fourth-stimulus-check-what-we-found-out">
              <div class="responsive-image__container" data-v-0cd7fcba="">
               <div class="responsive-image__lazy-container" data-v-0cd7fcba="" style="background-image:url('https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2021/03/592/333/e22ac230-2cf2385f-stimulus-checks.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1');">
                <img alt="Will there be a fourth stimulus check?                </div>

             <header class="info-header">
              <h3 class="title">
               <a href="/news/video-shows-bystander-grabbing-mans-foot-after-he-falls-backward-off-of-balcony">
                Video shows bystander grabbing man’s foot after he falls backward off of balcony
               </a>
              </h3>
             </header>
             <p class="dek">
              A shocking video showed a man narrowly escaping serious injury or death after falling backward over a balcony thanks to a quick-thinking bystander who grabbed his foot.
             </p>
